Html:
I use Word 2016 on Windows 10 and the add-on works great except that it removes internal hyperlinks. So the table of contents or cross references within the document are lost. This is a shame since it's very handy when reading the document on the screen. External hyperlinks continue to work.

I assume it could be related to the removal of field codes in the latest version. Could this be made optional? I Penny distribute PDFs so the field codes are eventually gone anyways.

Update: I could verify that version 1.1 doesn't have that limitation. I'm working with 1.1 now for the time being.
